SCRIPT.MSCRI: ! Escaping characters : SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@WINDOWS : CASE "UNIX" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.ESCAPE_CHARS@UNIX : OTHER : ENDSWITCH

DOCU_Docu.DOC: It escapes the input parameters and wrap the parameter surrounded by quotes(").
